1453.content:
Tails rubbed his eyes and sipped at a cup of coffee. He wretched a little then forced it down. One of these days, he thought, I ought to make something that can warm up coffee again. Calibrating...calibrating...jeez more calibrating. He glanced to his right to check another screen.

A swarm of metallic spider-like creatures lay dormant in a glowing blue sea. Their design always struck him as ghoulish, something Doctor Robotnik might have cooked up in his spare time. Even his teammates and friends seemed bothered. Yet, in the end, he decided on something more pragmatic rather than pretty. Making things pretty ate too much of the budget.

Two loud beeps snapped him to attention. Calibration complete. The spiders shivered with life while they swam around in their artificial blood-plasma. Machines clicked and whirred while Tails switched off the electronic micro-scope. Tails stood from his seat and took a deep breath.

He spent all night in that lab, slaving and calibrating. Then calibrating again. Testing blood sample after blood sample. Time was almost out. The project already lagged four-going-on-five weeks behind. He dreaded the deadline, but to fix the deadline...well that sat on a different plane of scary.

Blood testing results looked alright, everything came back positive. If this project worked like it should have from the beginning, then testing class-D or even class-C organisms might come next. Not anymore. If he wanted the results he needed to sate the investors, then Class-A organisms needed testing.

Sapient, thinking, Mobians.

Tails knew a number of desperate people out there willing to put their bodies on the line for a paycheck. Every moral bone in his body raged against such a notion. No innocents hurt. So then that left another alternative.

The fox entered the preparation chamber his back rigid with fear. A neat little vial rested upon a table, filled to the rubber sealed lid with blue liquid. They don't look so bad from here, thought Tails. He picked it up, grabbed a hypo and loaded the nano-machines into it.

Like a gun, Tails gulped.

Just him and the needle now. His inventive prowess got him this far, and more often than not he put his body on the line for others. Today proved no different, right? He dabbed an alcohol pad on his vein and readied the needle.

Deep breaths, count back Tails.

Three...

He steadied his hand and moved the hypo to his protruding vein.

Two...

He relaxed his free arm, making it tense only made things worse.

One...

He pressed the needle into the skin. Sharp pain for a second, then a cold rush up and down his arm as the liquid emptied from the vial. He pulled the hypo from his skin and reached for a patch of gauze. Only to pause.

The wound in his arm sealed up the moment the needle left his skin. A smile cracked on his lips, so far so good. His heart pounded in his chest while a strange sensation overcame him. His vision cleared to an almost crystaline quality, and the night's exhaustion faded.

Those nano-machines worked fast. He snapped out of his excitement and grasped for a recording device.

"Project Super Cells Class-A Trial one, the machines are doing exactly what they were programmed for. Managing my body's consumption of energy at an excellent rate. I've never felt so awake, and my senses are hard to explain. Almost like I can see or hear a new frequency, so far there are no negative side-effects I can feel thus far. A metaphorical whip-lash from the instant change maybe?"

He clicked off the recording device and let out a giddy chuckle. He swore he felt the machines swimming around inside of him, making a gradual change each passing second. Just a few weeks of this and the investors just might be pleased.

Despite his artificial second wind, Tails knew the machines still needed time to really kick in. Perhaps a well-deserved nap to congratulate himself. He moved throughout his lab to one of the cots in the back, perfect for all-nighters like these.

He set aside his recording device, curled up in his blanket, and forced his eyes shut.

~~
The machines toiled endlessly in their host. Hour after hour they surged through his bloodstream. Kicking wasteful cells into the shape. Snatching and recycling still useful bits of caloric energy. With everything regulated so efficiently, the super-cells matched their master's programming to the dot.

The night dragged on, and a strange realization stunned the nano-machine's AI. Their flawless energy budgeting left them to their proverbial knees in excess calories. Dinner and a night's worth of coffee never seemed so vast. Concerned with their directive, they knew this energy needed to be used, not wasted.

Yet the master slumbered, he did not burn enough to warrant use for this energy. They knew a body's own programming in and out, it all came part of their own AI. Their data-banks knew a body with excess energy did not get rid of it.

No, it stored it.

Of course! They obeyed the directive, and set to work on their master. One adipose cell at a time.

His mind made up, he started to waddle off to his work desk... Only to come right back and grab another bag of chips. Something told him he'd need the extra fuel.

------

1. Growing Suspicions: Something's definitely up here. But what can Tails do about it? The mysterious admirer seems to be related; why not start by trying to find a way to contact them?

2. Growing Acceptance: Despite everything, Tails can't help but enjoy what's happening to him. Every bite of food he takes, every pound of fat he gains just feels right and gives him more confidence in pursuing this lifestyle.

3. Growing Cycle: Tails awakens the next morning to find himself back to his original size, with yesterday's events feeling like some weird dream. However, he quickly finds he's gained quite the ravenous appetite, and with each bite he takes...
1523.title: New Chair Please?

15232.content:
Making a new tablet wouldn't be too hard. Well, in terms of putting the thing together. The real challenges Tails could foresee were deciding on things like pressure sensitivity, durability, functionality, and size.

         That last one in particular would no doubt prove the most important. Especially, Tails thought as he ate two chips in one bite, if he was going to get any bigger.

         Not that there was any doubt he would. Even if his secret admirer didn't give him any more "special" feasts, the regular ones would still be more than enough to make him puff up like an extra fluffy loaf of bread. Speaking of bread, it wouldn't be a bad idea to make himself a sandwich later. Or maybe head down to the bakery and get one of everything. Their cakes and pastries were on the bland side, but their croissants were so soft and buttery and flaky and just all-around great. Ooh, especially the ones filled with chocolate or cream! Those were sooo good! And fattening! That settled it, he was definitely treating himself after making enough progress.

         Tails swallowed his latest mouthful of chips and frowned. "Should I really be thinking about that when I haven't even finished my current snack?" He reached into the chip bag only to come up empty. "I've only just finished the first bag..."

         The first party size bag, at that.

         Eyes wide with surprise and more joy than he ought to feel, he pulled his hand out of the bag. Acting on some instinct he didn't know he had, Tails licked it clean of the nacho cheese dust coating it. The strong flavoring made his tails wag.

         "Why...'m I...'njoy'n'...this?" he mumbled as he sucked up what he could. Once done, he wiped some residue off his mouth and licked that up too. "I know I wasn't this big a glutton yesterday."

         Indeed. His appetite seemed to flourish with each passing day.

         "But that can't be right." The hand not previously covered in dust grabbed at a love handle. "I was normal size. I was eating normal size meals. And I had normal thoughts that didn't involve getting fat."

         Ah, such different times. They really did feel like they were only yesterday.

         "It was yesterday! ... Wasn't it?"

         His gains were rather gradual at first. They'd only recently become noticeable. Enough so that he could swear he was growing right before his very eyes.

         "I did grow before my very eyes! I mean, I'm pretty sure I did. I think that happened..." He groaned, shook his head. "Did it? My chair broke and all..."

         It just couldn't take his weight anymore. Come to think of it, it was high time he replaced all his furniture. He'd put it off for too long.

         "This can't be right." He looked down at himself. A belly that enveloped his lap, hid his feet (which could now touch the ground) from view, and propped up bra-worthy moobs. Familiar yet foreign at the same time. It wasn't him at all, but... Somehow, it felt right.

         "Maybe..."

         Maybe he did grow on the spot. Maybe he'd grown over time and only just now noticed, with his "sudden growth" just being his awareness catching up with the rest of him.

         "Still..."

         Still, these conflicting memories had to mean something.

         "But..."

         But did it matter? One way or another, he was fat. Really fat. And as much it bothered him, it felt good.

         Tails heaved a deep sigh. He glowered at the sketchpad on his desk. Blank. Another sigh.

         "I'll try again tomorrow."

         And with that, he popped open his second bag of chips and set to shoveling them into his maw. A troubled mind and an empty stomach would never let him get anything done. Might as well fix one of them.

         In the back of his mind, he made a note to go grab the milk in the fridge after finishing the chips. He'd need it for all those cookies.

         Plus, a growing boy needed his milk to grow up nice and big.

------

1. Insatiable: Despite the snack, Tails is still hungry. Better make that sandwich, and make it huge! And he can't forget that trip to the bakery afterword. Sheesh, you'd think he wouldn't be so hungry after a massive pizza binge...

2. Next Morning: Jumping ahead to the following day, Tails is treated to a mountain of doughnuts for breakfast, courtesy of his admirer.
15232.title: Growing Acceptance

152322.content:
After however long Tails spent dozing since waking up, he opened his eyes. His room was still pretty dark thanks to his blackout curtains.

         "What time is it," he mumbled. Turning his head to the nightstand clock revealed it was 8:46. Not too bad.

         Getting out of bed was typically nothing special, but at his size it required some finesse. One leg over the side, then the other. Lay on his side and push up. No stopping until he was perfectly upright. And finally, push off and stand up. (But no pushing off too hard! He didn't want to land on his gut!)

         He stretched his back, then his arms. "Let's see," he said, his hands coming down to scratch his belly, "breakfast or shower first?"

         His stomach answered the question with a growl. He chuckled. "Yeah, I figured."

         As he waddled over to the door, memories of the day before bubbled up to the forefront of his mind. His post-pizza binge snack had properly staved off his appetite long enough for dinner. That said, why would he even need a snack in the first place? Those pizzas were extra-large. But then again, his sudden growth spurt might have kicked his metabolism into overdrive. If it actually happened.

         Tails groaned. Morning was the worst time to deal with conflicting thoughts. Especially before breakfast. Best to just set it all aside for now and put a nice, big meal together. But what was a fat fox to have? Maybe--

         Three knocks pulled him out of his thoughts.

         His ears perked up, his tails flicked, his heart rate picked up, and a grin dimpled his cheeks. "Wow, already?" The elation in his voice was clear as day. It'd been too long since his admirer sent him breakfast. He could barely contain his glee as he waddled to the front door, licking his lips in anticipation.

         A tower of boxes comparable to yesterday's greeted him. They were pure white and lacked any identifying logos, but he didn't have to guess at their contents. Growing giddier by the second, he lifted the usual video camera off the top to get the usual typed note.

"Good morning. I know I usually wait until lunch or dinner but I just can't hold off that long. I loved your last video so much. I can't get enough of how much you can eat. Do you remember when you just got started? You could barely handle one large pizza. Now you can pack away whole stacks of extra larges. And you always look so happy when you stuff yourself. It makes me happy too.

By the way, how was my special gift? Did you like the surprise? I bet you did. The rate you've been growing, I figured you wanted to grow even faster. Let me know if you want more of my special gifts in the future. Oh, and also let me know if I should send that replacement chair sooner rather than later.

Enjoy, and don't forget to let me watch!"

         Tails grinned. Their enthusiasm was always apparent, but this time especially so.

         Not that he could blame them. Knowing there was someone out there willing and eager to help him get fat was just... He couldn't put into words how happy that made him. His tails were wagging hard enough to deliver light smacks to his big bubble butt. They even sent small ripples through the fat.

         Part of him realized he should care more about the fact his admirer induced a hyper-accelerated weight gain without a clearer warning, or that they could even do such a thing in the first place. Of course, this was the same part that had been pestering him with those obnoxious doubts since yesterday, so he wasn't exactly keen on paying it much mind. Plus he was just happy to confirm he didn't imagine yesterday's gains.

         After fumbling a bit with the camera, he managed to get a recording going. He smiled into the lens. "Hi. Glad you enjoyed the last one. That surprise of yours was really, um, surprising. Can't argue with the results though." He angled the camera down to give a good view of his flabby front.

         "Yeah. Pretty impressive, huh?" The pride in his voice rang clear as day. Chuckling, he added, "Don't worry. You'll see the rest in just a bit. I hope I don't sound too egotistical when I say this, but I'm looking better than ever thanks to you!"

         He lingered for a few moments before pulling the camera back up to his face. A blush colored his cheeks. "And, uh... Well, I think I'd be okay with more of your, um, your special gifts in the future. But please give me a little more warning in the future, okay?

         "Oh, and I'm going to need that new chair sooner rather than later."

         Was he supposed to sound happy about that last bit? Probably not, but he didn't care. In fact, scratch that. He should be happy about it. It's a fatty's ultimate goal to outgrow everything, right? Right!

         Nagging doubts pestered Tails once more as he moved to set up the camera, but he was finding it much easier to brush them aside this morning. His admirer went out of their way to set up a nice breakfast feast for him and gosh darn it, he was going to enjoy it!

         Since his arm chair was out of commission, he had to move his stuffing spot to the loveseat. "I wonder how long it'll take to outgrow this one," he remarked with a grin to the camera. It was obvious bait, but far too tempting for his admirer to resist.

         The boxes came in three at a time. Tails stalled with each set, letting the camera soak up his meaty back and bending over a little more than necessary when setting them down. He nearly fell over a couple times but he didn't mind it one bit. Gravity threatening to pull him down to the ground sent a thrill down his spine.

         Once all the boxes had been relocated and Tails made himself comfy, he set one on top of his belly and dug in with an unceremonious "Here goes."

         Plain, glazed, powdered, chocolate frosted, strawberry frosted, jelly filled, Bavarian cream... So many different kinds of donuts in the first box alone. There was an attempt to start at a slow pace...which didn't last beyond the first bite. The instant that sugary goodness hit his taste buds, his appetite took over and drove him to gulp everything down in massive bites. He'd barely finish one mouthful before starting on another.

         The first box went down in short order, as did the second. And the third. And the fourth. The fifth one too, but by then he'd finally mustered enough self control to slow down and take a second to assess his current status. The tower of boxes was almost half its original size, with seven left to go.

         Ah, seven. That would've been a daunting number of boxes some time ago. Heck, five would've been daunting at one point! But not anymore, not to this master glutton in the making.

         Wait, since when have I wanted to be a "master glutton"?

         Tails shrugged off the thought. No doubts, not during breakfast. Especially when he had an audience to entertain and an appetite that seemed to have grown alongside the rest of him yesterday. He normally would've dented his appetite by now, yet he felt awfully ravenous this morning. An effect of his admirer's special gift?

         Whatever. Just keep eating.

         Box number six plopped down on his belly. He pulled out a jelly doughnut, brought it to his lips, then stopped. Sure, he could just wolf it down like normal, buuut...

         He considered the doughnut for a moment, grinned. "You know what? I'd like to try something."

         Opening his mouth as wide as possible, he slowly slid the treat in. Sugar tickled his tongue, tempting him to bite down. But he refrained. Only after barely fitting the whole thing into his mouth did he finally relent. All that sweet sugar, dough, and jelly hit him at once. It overwhelmed him and he let out a moan. So good, sooo gooood...!

         He chewed and chewed and chewed until he could no longer taste anything. Swallowing, he looked at the camera and said, "I think I'll eat all the rest like that. Let me know what you think of it!"

         The remainder of box six went much the same. It didn't take long for Tails to get a handle on this new method of eating. By the time he started on box seven, he'd already worked out a good rhythm. He could easily stuff each one into his mouth with no trouble, and while he still savored each one, he didn't spend too much time chewing them, lest he ran the risk of losing his admirer's interest by drawing things out too long.

         All the while, he couldn't help punctuating each one with a moan. It wasn't just because they tasted great, either. In the years since Tails first dedicated himself to fattening up he'd learned and refined a great many techniques for optimizing his weight gain, enhancing his appetite, and demonstrating his gluttony in ways his younger, tinier self could only dream of.

         Seven boxes emptied of their contents, then eight. The sheer quantity of the feast was finally catching up with Tails. Not quite close to full, but getting there. Down went the ninth box, as did the tenth. He could feel himself slowing down throughout the eleventh, full but not yet stuffed. An improvement over yesterday. He would've had to force himself to power through all of the last box, but today that only applied to the last few doughnuts. Pained groans mixed with his delighted moans.

         Come on big guy, just three more...

         Two more...

         Last one. Just take a moment to breathe, and...

         Done.

------

Just Another Day: After wrapping up the video, Tails relaxes a bit before moving on with his day.

Second Course?: A few minutes pass before Tails is suddenly hungry again! Good thing his admirer's ready with another feast.

Not Quite a Food Coma: Before Tails can end the recording, his brain fogs over...
152322.title: Next Morning

1523221.content:
Tails slumped into the loveseat. His chest lightly dusted in a sheet of powdered sugar and crumbs like a glutton's afterglow. He patted his flabby moobs clear -- clear as he could get it at least -- then looked into the camera. A lazy smile on his lips.

"That hit the spot," Tails said. His paws glided over the expanse of himself. A rumble -- Tails held his fist to his lips and stifled a belch.

Tails took the camera in his podgy paws and said his usual goodbyes. Beep. Tails shut the digital viewfinder on the camera.

This isn't normal, the nag in his brain chided. None of this was normal. Two days ago he was with...

Tails squinched his brow. Who was he with? Tails bounced the camera between his paws.

It would come to him later, he was sure of it.

The fox hoisted himself out of the couch. Waves of cascading flab spilled forward past his knees, threatening to drag him to the floor, but his sturdy lower back fought for balance. Three...two...oof.

Tail's boulder belly wobbled as he righted himself. He labored for breath as he let the thousands of calories take hold in his gut. Once he was certain nothing was coming back up, he took an empty donut box and deposited the camera inside. To the front porch, it went.

Tails looked side to side for any signs of voyeurs -- still hoping he might see his mysterious admirer. But all was silent. Nothing stirred among the sparse trees across from his house. His nearest neighbor was a good half-mile down the spiraling hillside road. Ever silent in the morning haze.

Unsure what he expected, the fox shut the door. A slight pang of disappointment curdled in his gut. Nothing a glass of milk wouldn't cure.

Tails gulped his milk as he took the television remote from his kitchen counter. The paint on the power button long since rubbed off. He set the audio to his house speakers and let the Mobius Morning Minute play softly in the background.

"Come on Miles, figure this out," he mumbled as he attempted to fold his arms. Perhaps a bit of routine would assuage his anxieties. Tails scritched his undermoob then toddled off to his bathroom.

The showerhead hissed. Steam billowed from the walk-in shower. Water splashed down his hills and folds. He unhooked the showerhead from its perch and held it beneath his belly. Moaning as the tender hidden folds were rinsed out with water.

A loofa on a stick, simple tool as it was, helped him reach every corner of his obese body. Tails started with the hardest parts: his feet. It felt like only a few days ago he could see them, but now he blindly groped for them. Adjusting his gut with his free hand to gain better purchase on his knees.

Tails knew it was only a matter of inches before he'd never again reach his feet on his own. The fox already traded his once trusty sneakers for sandals -- tying the laces was impossible without assistance. The thought should have worried him. It should have, at the very least, scared the half-hearted idea of a diet into the wrinkles of his brain.

Perhaps even more worrisome was the giddiness he felt at such a prospect. He was on the cusp of a milestone. How much heavier until immobility?

But he lived alone. He was already getting too big for one fox to handle. Maybe too big for two foxes. Tails ears fell. Finally, that nagging voice made a point he couldn't refute.

Tails scoffed. Since when was he a quitter? He just had to figure a way out around this problem. He scratched his chin, the water and steam brought clarity like never before.

Duh, he was an inventor! He could build anything to cover his 'blind spots.' Tails smirked.

---

Tails waddled to his workshop a little faster than usual. His ceullite laden thighs jiggled wildly as he pulled up a reinforced office chair. The steel frame moaned beneath his weight as he pulled up to his desk.

The fat fox cobbled together pencils and papers. Schematics took shape in his mind's eye. Before graphite touched paper, Tails saw it on the wall.

A framed photo from years ago. He saw himself, a portly child. His brain protested -- he was never that big, not once in his life. But that nagging voice could not pull him from the other fact about the picture.

For the young fox in the picture was seated in Doctor Ivo Robotnik's lap.

Tail's winced. A lifetime of memories came rushing back.

His parents were gone, the others didn't understand him. They pushed him away. This strange fox with two tails. Too smart for his own good. But Sonic was supposed to find him. Not Robotnik...

------

The Protege: As his memories return, Tails remembers quickly taking after the evil doctor. With their combined brain power, they perfected the Death Egg and defeated Sonic. Mobius was theirs. Or...

The Moral Compass: Tails turned the doctor from his evil path. Instead of dominating the world they chose to use their inventions to better the world. However Sonic never quite learned to trust this 'new' Eggman...
1523221.title: Just Another Day

15232211.content:
As he stared dumbfounded, images returned to Tails' mind. Vivid, bombastic images so packed with energy he couldn't believe he'd ever have forgotten...

-

Doctor Ivo Robotnik's bright orange mustache was pointing nearly straight up on both sides of his head, like a pair of devil horns, angled in such a way because of the great, broad, gleeful grin that he was sporting. His bright white teeth gleamed like pearls in the reflection of the monitor.

"Yes- yes- yes!!!" The great big man nearly screamed, leaning further and further forwards punctuating each triumphant yell. His eyes were wide with anticipation, as he watched the live video feed, streaming directly to his marvelous space station from the camera eyes of his beautiful robot, as it perfectly blocked, parried, and countered every attempted strike from that pitiful little blue rodent.

Robotnik's fingers flew in a violent blitz across the control panel before him, like a mad pianist composing a complex masterpiece, he remotely piloted the Death Egg Robot, guardian of his space station, his final and ultimate line of defense against his greatest opposition, and the piece of work which was currently absolutely trashing that rotten hedgehog.

As Sonic was flung to the side, trying to rise again- but stumbling, and falling to the cold steel floor, Robotnik's melodic, booming laugh rung out, filling every corner of the room like an opera singer. He'd won- he'd won!

Ah, but it wasn't only him who'd won...

With a joyous dramatic flair, Dr. Robotnik- the impending new Ruler of Mobius- wheeled around, pointing towards the other round bodied figure in the control room, whose fur was just as bright and firey orange as the animated Doctor's moustache.

"Now, my boy! Synchronize with me- And activate the Death Egg Robot Ion Disruptor!" He shouted eagerly, raising a clenched fist to the air with all the bravado of a Broadway star, "you've earned the catharsis as much as I- so share with me the FINAL BLOW!!!"

"Ohhh- I can't wait a second longer!" Said Tails, as he eagerly leapt to Robotnik's side, grinning at the prone blue hedgehog on the screen- preparing to obliterate him once and for all....

-

It can't be. I'd never do that to Sonic!

Tails stared at the picture, the great imposing beast of a man- All red, orange, and yellow- with that flamboyant mustache and those gleaming white teeth. He shivered, just looking at a picture of him, he could remember Robotnik's bizarre, blusterous charisma- his intelligence and mania, his presence chock full of vitality and fury which was at once absurd and threatening.

And...there he was. Chubby little harmless Miles Prower, during his childhood, grinning at the camera and embracing this monster...

but...as Tails' gaze slowly drifted down and he looked at himself- his double chin bunching up as he looked down so much that it was in his field of view, his gut resting on his legs as he sat down so much that it was pouring out past his knees, a resting place for his gargantuan moobs- something occurred to him.

Why in the world did he think such bad things about Robotnik?

Looking up again, he didn't see a boisterous, overwhelming, terrifying monster of a man- Rather, a charismatic, energetic, comforting genius- who was happy to take him in and mentor him.

But he killed Sonic! He made me kill Sonic!

Then again...why would that be a problem? Who was Sonic to Tails?

He was my friend! Wasn't he?

No... Tails thought back, straining his mind through the fog- effort which nearly brought on a headache. He was almost certain, in retrospect, Sonic had always been a terrorist. A feral, stupid little monster, who aimed to ruin his and Robotnik's empire for selfish shortsighted reasons. But...he couldn't shake that feeling that there was something more...

...ugh, speaking of more, Tails found himself suddenly feeling quite hungry. How long had that shower been? It was like he hadn't eaten any breakfast at all.

No, I can't think about food right now! This is a major revelation- I need to assess the implications of this!!

Tails groaned. Of course it was the same side of him which kept doubting his cravings, his desire to grow, which was questioning his past. He looked at the picture one more time- Robotnik and him, smiling, looking perfectly happy and benevolent. Why shouldn't he just brush it off and accept this, like he accepted his hunger, size, and desire to increase them?

He placed his pencil down on the drafting table, taking a moment to look at his hand. The fingers were thick, doughy- with creased flesh folds at the joints, and the palms were like mittens. He couldn't see his feet, but he could kind of feel they were in a similar state, as he pressed them to the cold floor of his lab, straining his leg muscles as he grit his teeth and heaved himself into a standing position. His enormous round belly falling like an apron, hitting his thighs with a slap and wobbling gently- moobs falling onto it in turn. He could even feel his sprawling butt hit the back of his thighs as he stood up. It felt good- feeling his own body lay on and rub against itself like that. He could really feel how big he was, and it soothed his mind.

Looking at the photograph again, he chuckled, raising a paw and glancing at it. "Look at me- hands too fat for gloves, feet too fat for shoes, a butt too fat for a chair! I'm bigger than the old man ever was! Though...maybe not taller..." He said to himself, slowly turning his body around as he began to lumber to the kitchen. "I'll invent those gadgets I was thinking of on a full stomach. And, maybe after that I'll try to figure out what's happening....maybe."

----

A second surprise
On Tails' way to the kitchen, he suddenly starts to thicken up on his own again! Seems like whatever his admirer put in those pizzas was in those donuts too!

Wait...where am I?
After getting himself a nice snack, Tails begins to wonder about the events he remembered. He tries to make sense of it by figuring out exactly where the house he's in right now even is...
15232211.title: Robotnik Triumphant!

152322111.content:
As Tails lazily, yet laboriously, waddled towards the kitchen, he felt a somewhat familiar pang in his globular gut. It wasn't hunger- or a stomach ache. He paused, looking down and resting a palm on his gut, and after a moment of curious feeling around his midsection, what exactly was happening hit him.

"I'm growing...again??" He questioned, holding both of his hands up on his gut, and keeping them in place. After a few moments passed, and he started to see them slowly drift apart as the belly they rested on bulged further and further out, his suspicion was confirmed.

"Well at least I got up first this time..." Tails muttered, remembering how hard it'd been for him to get up when he broke his old armchair. He smirked as he admired his gut- filling out even further bit by bit, before his very eyes. That chair at his desk, reinforced or not, definitely wouldn't have been able to handle this little growth spurt. And if he had trouble getting up last time, oh boy- he was glad not to be flat on his ass now!

Oh yeah! Speaking of his ass- he could feel it bloating up with lard too, keeping pace with his marvelous gut as it grew. He could feel his increasingly meaty thighs supporting both of them now- his gut having plumped up so much it hung down to his knees, and his ass similarly resting partway down the back of them, just like his belly earlier.

His arms slowly, involuntarily, lifted up- the sleeves of fat surrounding them getting so thick that they didn't even hang fully down when he rested them on his side. His toes, heels, and sides of his feet all began to touch the floor- as he outgrew his sandles. Though the straps stretched to cling on to his paws still, the soles of the shoes were no longer big enough to contain his own.

He even felt his head tilt up ever so slightly! The bountiful chins which hung out into the cleavage of his expansive moobs were actually forcing his head up a little bit!

Once he felt the growth slow, and finally stop, he tested his range of movement. Wiggling his toes and fingers, the sheer thickness of his digits providing a bit of resistance- but he felt he could still use his hands...mostly. It was also harder to bend his limbs- the fat all around his knees, hips, elbows, and shoulders was acting as a buffer, getting in his way.

He grunted, bringing his arms together as far as he could- trying to clutch both of his hands together. He felt them bounce back just a few inches apart- his thick bingo wings and moobs conspiring against him. He grit his teeth, sweat dripping down his brow as he pushed- the fat squishing up against itself, rising like a loaf of bread as he brought his arms closer inwards, causing his chins to bunch up, and force him to face up even more.

"C'mon....c'mon..." Tails groaned, trying desperately to crane his neck and look straight ahead- until finally, he felt his fingers touch. He quickly wrapped them around each other, holding firm, as he let his arms relax just enough to look down. He just barely saw past the twin hills of his moobs coming up into his face, his own hands clasped together, as his cheeks and chin firmly engulfed the lower part of his face as he struggled to look down.

He sighed, satisfied with his dexterity- letting go and allowing his arms to flop back into place at his side, the wide fox's moobs surging out and slapping against his belly once he finally released them.

"Alright...I can still....work...." He said between panting breaths, choosing to ignore how difficult that was- and how hard it'd be to do that all the time if he wanted to build those mobility assistance machines at his desk. Not to mention sitting on that chair...

He shook his head dismissively. "Doesn't matter...not right now..." He said, glancing around the lab. "What matters is...aha!" He exclaimed triumphantly, spotting what he wanted in the corner. He stumbled forwards, lifting his heavy legs to take a single step having become a Heck of an undertaking. He managed to slowly get ahold of awkwardly maneuvering his heavy, sloshing, obese body- until he was standing right where he needed to be...

...in front of a nice big, wide, tall mirror wall- it was for getting a good full view of vehicles when he was working on them, but right now all he wanted a good full view of was the gorgeous hunk of blubber he'd grown into. He beamed at himself, doing a few of the best poses he could, admiring all that lard of his. "Well hey there, you hunk~" he said to himself, giving his gut a slap. "Aren't you a whole lot of man..." He giggled- this wasn't exactly normal from him but...well, look at him! How could he resist savoring the feeling of taking all that in?

(Illustration! Full color, 3 poses, I did it myself just for this~ https://i.imgur.com/UrL1xoy.png )

After Tails finally finished admiring his growth, pridefully going over his huge body, he turned from the mirror. "Alright- enough messing around, I gotta get back to what I was doing..."

Distracted by gluttony
"What he was doing" in this case was going to get another meal! Even though he bloated up so much, he still didn't eat anything since those donuts. And that was like, what, an hour ago? Hour and a half? That's way too long without eating for Tails~

They won't invent themselves
Tails isn't gonna stop growing anytime soon, but even now he's struggling with basic tasks! He finds the focus to get back to that work bench, stand up if his butt's too heavy for that reinforced chair, and design and build a few simple tools to help him with his daily tasks as he continues growing. After all, if he puts it off for too long, he'll be too fat to invent anything!
152322111.title: Second surprise (illustrated)

1523221111.content:
"Breakfast!" Tails declared, licking his lips eagerly. He paused, "actually- No, I forgot- Breakfast was those donuts! Usually donuts would just be a snack, but I mean, there were twelve whole boxes- a hundred and fourty-four donuts are absolutely a complete breakfast!" he reasoned. Chuckling as he scratched one of his moobs idly, his doughy fingers squishing into the flab.

"Brunch, then!" he decided, eagerly marching off to the kitchen, his body swaying from side to side as he had to take exaggerated waddle-steps considering how thick his legs were, every footfall making a nice heavy thump. As he reached the doorway from his lab to the kitchen, he was stopped in his tracks- the fox having grown so fat that his big ol' belly was wider than the doorframe!

Tails murred happily, massaging his prodigious gut- having to reach out past his moobs to reach it. The way he'd bloated up like that- he gained so much so fast that he was getting stuck in the same door he used to enter! Though a bit of worry nagged at the back of his mind, he was more excited- and prideful than anything else.

"C'mon now, big guy- I know how nice and soft you are..." he muttered, digging his hands into the sides of his belly- sinking nearly elbow-deep into the fat. He grunted, pushing his gut inwards, "c'mon...squish...on through..." he said, letting out a sigh of relief as his gut popped through to the other side. He let go of it, enjoying the way it spilled out- sloshing and wobbling beautifully. He opened his maw lazily, letting out a resounding belch without a hint of shame, followed by a sigh of relief. Though- as he tried to step forwards- he found himself stuck again!

He was confused for a second, before he chuckled. "Oh- of course~" he said, peering over his shoulder as best he could- his head so swallowed up in cheek and chin fat that turning it much was tough. He gave his absolute dumptruck ass a hearty pat, his cheeks like fat filled sacks of dough- Big as beanbag chairs, and rising up his back to nearly shoulderblade level.

Grunting with effort, tails reached around and wrestled with his own lard- grappling his expansive rump as best as he could. "C'mon...c'mon...just get- hrnngh- through the door...I wanna eat, dangit..." he muttered. Soon, his efforts were rewarded- and his gigantic rear popped out of the doorframe- the obese fox stumbling a bit, nearly falling forwards.

He chuckled to himself, "Guess it's gonna have to be double doors and garage entrances from now on..." Tails thought aloud, before setting his eyes on the prize before him. His spacious, partially automated kitchen- a nice big fridge and plenty of cupboards filled with both ready made snacks, and nice fresh ingredients. Being the ingenious inventor he was, Tails had long since rigged up his kitchen with automatic cooking devices- He'd only have to enter a code and wait, for a nice fresh meal of his choice to be dropped in front of him! Good thing too, since at his size- he was definitely in no state to operate a stove.

Waddling over to his dining table- he laughed at the tiny frail little chair. Had his ass ever been that small? It was adorable, really. He grabbed it, haphazardly tossing it aside- And letting out a sigh of relief as he simply planted his gigantic butt on the floor- feet kicked out in front of him. He'd gotten so big that he didn't need a chair, his rump was both comfy enough and huge enough to give him a pretty normal seat at the low table.

He licked his lips, eyeing up the tablet which he could use to select the food he wanted prepared. He giggled a bit, "All that gaining...sure worked up a heck of an appetite~..."

Self control
Tails may love being big, but he's still smart! He knows he'll have to get back up and build mobility devices later, so he has a nice hearty meal- but a relatively modest one. After he finishes, he gets back on task! Just...entering his lab through the garage door, this time.

Self indulgence
Tails is a growing boy, and he likes it that way! He knows he's gonna have to do stuff later, but he's confident that he'll be fine- what matters most right now is getting food into his gut- and lots of it! He binges like there's no tomorrow. As for consequences...he'll cross that bridge when he comes to it. (If it doesn't break under his weight!)
1523221111.title: Distracted by gluttony

154.content:
Tails the fox was how you would say in a manner of speaking, born to be big fat and indeed huge and constantly hungry.

One day the huge titanic fox himself felt rather hungry and of course decided to go on an all out eating spree as he began giant stepping towards his front door leaving a hole in his front door after having smashed to pieces in the process.

Soon enough the blob fox himself was on the loose in his neighborhood as he targeted an unnamed fast food joint until he noticed another huge fat citizen hungrily eyeing the place itself.

Tails himself couldn't help but think it was none other than....
154.title: huge

choices: ...he was fighting Eggman's robot his size.
1551.content:
Station Square was huge in comparison to other cities in all. There were some busy traffics among the way and all it seemed pretty normal in some cases, that is until one noise came to that. Their normal say was halted by that thumping noise, followed by a ground shook like earthquakes in motions. Many citizens wondered in their worrying sight as to what was going on, and so they should, when that huge cast of shadow had covered the entire section of the street.

There were screams all over and many people had started to run away from that huge looking figure, who looked so obese and humongous, that was waddling through the streets for whatever reason behind this. That huge looking figure you may ask is Tails.

Tails is more a fat giant, ever since Dr Eggman was going to test the ray machine to take over city. he may have stopped that, but too a risk by being hit by a laser beam, which made him into a obese giant that he is now. He's now looking bottom-heavy, which meant that his massive ass and thighs are the biggest part of his body in all, with his fat belly also bigger and jiggled each by step with it. The rest of his body was looking thick and chunky, and Tails had to settle in life like this in size.

He may had mixed emotion in all, but he would always be gentle or more to be careful not knocking down the city as much as his massive size may not go to his way. He looks like Godzilla, but fatter in some sense. Tails was waddling through the streets of the city when....
